item.title: ‘She’s been moving money from his account’: My late father wrote a will before meeting his current wife. Who gets his money?
item.description: “He gave his fourth wife power of attorney and access to his bank account to pay bills.”

item.title: Is there such a thing as too much Taylor Swift? Not for Disney.
item.description: There is no sign yet of Taylor Swift fatigue, as a docuseries on Swift’s “The Eras Tour” is set to be released on Disney+ in December, just months aft...

item.title: These stocks are surging as JPMorgan follows Trump’s lead with investments in ‘critical’ industries

item.title: Is Meta’s stock in trouble? OpenAI’s new app has Wall Street worried.
item.description: OpenAI’s Sora app could fundamentally change the social-media landscape and leave Meta scrambling to catch up.

item.title: Andrew Lloyd Webber says Broadway musicals may be an endangered species: ‘The costs of production are just cripplingly high’
item.description: The composer of “The Phantom of the Opera,” “Cats,” “Evita” and many others, is enjoying a new — and busy — chapter in his decades-long career
